Command line utitlites
======================

Disparity
---------

.. argparse::
   :ref: DisneyDisp.disparity.parser
   :prog: disparity

-------

.. argparse::
   :ref: DisneyDisp.imgs2lf.parser
   :prog: imgs2lf

------

.. argparse::
   :ref: DisneyDisp.lf2epi.parser
   :prog: lf2epi

-------

.. argparse::
   :ref: DisneyDisp.clif2lf.parser
   :prog: clif2lf

---------

   :ref: DisneyDisp.dmap2hdf5.parser
